summary: DT*: THE CONTACT STATED WHILE TRAVELING 50 MPH, THE TRANSMISSION FAILED.  THE VEHICLE WAS PULLED OVER, AND DRIVEN TO THE DEALERSHIP AT SPEEDS BELOW 20 MPH.  THE TRANSMISSION WAS REPLACED.  TWO YEARS LATER, THE PROBLEM REOCCURRED.  THE VEHICLE WAS PUSHED TO THE SIDE OF THE ROAD AND WAS NOT INSPECTED BY A MECHANIC.
